meaningMnemonic: Just because there's a <kanji>mausoleum</kanji> on this <kanji>hill</kanji> doesn't mean it isn't still a <vocabulary>hill</vocabulary>. (It is. It's still a hill.)
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
